title: Tomb Raider 4 - The Last Revelation [PC game]
description:
Tomb Raider 4: The Last Revelation. [EIDOS]

Requirements:-
95/98/ME/XP 
Pentium 233MHz
16MB RAM

Copied DVD-ROM as an image.


Delivered in rar folder contains:-
1 image file [mdf/mds],
1 update patch to make the game compatible for XP and Vista,
1 text document,
1 short avi video how to install the game with a virtual machine.


Unrar the folder and mount the image [mds] using a virtual machine and finally install the 2 update patches.

I recommend to use Daemon Tools Virtual machine to mount the image.

I've added a link to download Daemon Tools in the text document.

If you havent got a rar extractor installed, download one from the link below.

I recommend 7Zip.

Once 7Zip is installed, simply right click on the downloaded rar folder > 7Zip > extract here.

 <a href="
http://www.filehippo.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.filehippo.com/</a>
